meanings.definition: A set of matching jewelry or ornaments worn together.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful parures of pearls and diamonds to the party.
meanings.sent2: The queen's parures sparkled under the bright lights of the ballroom.
meanings.sent3: The parures of colorful beads made her look like a walking rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her parures were like tiny treasures adorning her neck and wrists.
meanings.sent5: The parures she wore were so exquisite that everyone admired them.

meanings.definition: To adorn oneself with a set of matching jewelry or ornaments.
meanings.sent1: She loved to parures herself with elegant jewelry for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The actress would parures herself with diamonds before walking the red carpet.
meanings.sent3: He decided to parures himself with all the jewelry he owned, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: She would parures herself with confidence, knowing she looked stunning.
meanings.sent5: Parures yourself with grace and charm, and you will shine wherever you go.
